mhframework

Class MHActorList

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhframework.MHActorList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MHRenderable

    public class MHActorList
extends java.lang.Object
implements MHRenderable
    This class keeps a collection of MHActor objects.
    Author:
    Michael Henson
